commands: pm2 logs summit --err --lines 30 --nostream 2>&1 || echo 'No error logs'
pm2 logs summit --out --lines 30 --nostream 2>&1 || echo 'No output logs'
echo '=== Try starting server manually to see errors ==='
cd /var/www/summit/server && timeout 5 node dist/index.js 2>&1 || echo 'Server start test completed'
